com.intel.bigdatamem

Class CommonAllocator<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.bigdatamem.CommonAllocator<A>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Allocatable<A>, Allocator<A>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BigDataMemAllocator, CommonPersistAllocator, SysMemAllocator

    public abstract class CommonAllocator<A extends CommonAllocator<A>>
extends Object
implements Allocator<A>
    an abstract common class for memory allocator to provide common functionalities.
